title: HashHelix Stage 5 Master Validator (Engine Only)
description: Root schema for validating Stage 5 engine constructs: lanes, checkpoint chains, and proofs-of-determinism. Relics, tiers, vaults, and economic objects are intentionally excluded from this public schema.

version.description: Semantic version of the master validation schema.

checkpoints.description: Ordered list of checkpoint-chain entries for this validation bundle.

proofs.description: Engine-level proofs of determinism (e.g., chiral commitments, Merkle roots).

proofObject.description: Minimal engine-only proof object. Higher-level relic and vault semantics are private and not modeled here.

digest.description: Hex-encoded SHA-256 digest or equivalent proof hash.

laneId.description: Optional lane identifier this proof is associated with.

epoch.description: Optional epoch index this proof is associated with.
